Translations.Text: Cite pro them example 2 vir nos dedit unus de them 2 gardens grapes surrounded de datum palms locus alius crops them
Ambo gardens produced their crops on temporis, generously nos causa river run them
Dodum post harvesting he boastfully told his friend ego est far prosperous than vos ego command magis prenobilis people
When he iniit his garden he wronged his anima dictus ego non think hoc ever finis
Alias ego think hoc est it ego non think Hora Hereafter ever advenit pass Et si ego returned my Dominus ego est clever satis possess ut et bonus 1 over ibi
His friend dictus to eum prout he debated eum vos disbelieved Unus qui created vos dust tunc tiny drop tunc perfected vos into vir
Prout pro me DEUS est my Dominus ego nunquam set any alius deus my Dominus
When vos iniit tuus garden vos dictus â€˜Hoc est quod DEUS dedit me (Maa Shaa Allah)! Non 1 possesses power DEUS La Quwwata Ellaa Bellaah.) '! Vos vide ego possess minus moneta minus infans than vos
My Dominus grant me bonus than tuus garden He send violent storm caelum wipes out tuus garden sinister it completely barren
its aqua sink deeper tuus reach
Indeed his crops wiped out he finis sorrowful lamenting quod he spent it in vain his property lay barren He tandem dictus Ego wish ego nunquam set my property deus my Dominus
non force terra helped eum contra DEUS nor est it possible pro eum receive any help
Est unus true Dominus magister est DEUS; He provisus bonus recompense Eum est bene destiny
